attributes.action: Support Donald Trump's invitation of a State Visit to the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: Donald Trump's well documented support of his nations people should ensure him being received by Her Majesty the Queen or the Prince of Wales. Therefore, President Donald Trump should be invited to the United Kingdom for an official State Visit.
attributes.background: Donald Trump should be allowed to enter the UK in his capacity as head of the US Government, and he should be invited to make an official State Visit by Her Majesty the Queen.
